sentences.sContent: We’re trying to drag the country out of its economic morass.
sentences.sCn: 我们在尽力使国家摆脱经济困境。

synos.tran: 沼泽；困境；乱糟糟的一堆

remMethod.val: mor (看作more) + ass (驴子) → 被很多驴子围住 → 陷入困境

trans.tranCn: 沼泽；困境；乱糟糟的一堆
trans.tranOther: a complicated and confusing situation that is very difficult to get out of
